name: TANKS (itch) (tanquesitostallerv)
description:
PITCH

ENEMY TYPES

Pink tank

You can only destroy it with the pink ammunition. Move fast before he gets you.

Orange Tank

You can only destroy it with the orange ammunition. Don't let him catch you.

Green Tank

You can only destroy it with the green ammunition. Destroy him before he does.

Blue Tank

You can only destroy it with the blue ammunition. Fight for the win.

Purple Tank

You can only destroy it with the purple ammunition. He's the last one, beat him.

DON'T FORGET TO USE YOUR COLORS ON THE OBSTACLES TOO!
